title: Save The Best For Last
desc:
Post 1325
- You become **Obsessed** with one player.
- Each time you make a player who is not your **Obsession** draw a card, your draw effects make people draw .5 extra cards (rounded up: maximum of 4).
- Each time you make your **Obsession** draw, your draw effects make people draw 1 less card (This can't become negative).
